name: Wolfenstein VR (itch)
description:
id Software released Wolfenstein 3D. Known as the grandfather of modern first-person shooters and groundbreaking in it's design, Wolfenstein 3D set a new, higher standard for action games.

We try to bring Wolfenstein to virtual reality.  We created an arcade-style head-mounted display version of Wolf3D aptly named "Wolfenstein VR."

Now, modern virtual reality tech allows us to step inside the castle once again in this tribute to one of the greatest games ever made.

All rights to Wolfenstein 3D belong to id Software.
